Sentence: The modern day characters, Hannah, Chloe, and Bernard, sit in the same room as Thomasina and Septimus
Bernard Nightingale, critic, comes to meet Hannah at the estate
Bernard tells Hannah he (Bernard) wants to collaborate with her (Hannah) on a project
As Bernard begins his (Bernard) dramatic oration, Hannah excitedly enters the room to talk to Valentine
Bernard enters the room, followed by Hannah, who is carrying a garden book
